text: Weekly Specials: slow-cooked ribs and royal lobster at discounted prices. Too tasty to share! Grab yours for 20% off only at Ola BBQ.
Only for Students: Longing for your mom’s amazing dishes? We promise ours are almost as tasty! Enjoy lunch at Ola BBQ between 12 pm and 2 pm and benefit from a 25% discount.
Limited Time Discounts: Only until 6 pm: Buy two pizzas before 6 pm and get the third one for free. Only at Ola BBQ. Please visit now for the amazing offers.
Events: Ola BBQ — Come down for some soft blues on Friday between 6 pm and 9 pm. First drink’s on us! Show this SMS to redeem your prize.
